import React, { useState } from 'react' import './updateui.css' const UpdateUi = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ vendor: '', product: '', amount: '', date: '' }); const { vendor, product, amount, date } = formData; const handleInput = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
Invoice
) } export default UpdateUi
